titles: An answer to Mr. Dodwell and Dr. Sherlocke, confuting an universal humane church-supremacy aristocratical and monarchical, as church-tyranny and popery : and defending Dr. Isaac Barrow's treatise against it by Richard Baxter ; preparatory to a fuller treatise against such an universal soveraignty as contrary to reason, Christianity, the Protestant profession, and the Church of England, though the corrupters usurp that title.
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Barrow, Isaac, 1630-1677. --  Treatise of the Pope's supremacy.
